summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Slotta booking platform - Auth system (P1) and backend connectivity (P0). All 22 backend API tests passed. Frontend auth flows (register, login, protected routes) working correctly. All dashboard pages load and fetch data from backend APIs.
critical_code_review_comments: All APIs are properly implemented with correct status codes and error handling
JWT auth is correctly implemented with token expiration and validation
Protected routes correctly redirect unauthenticated users to /login
All dashboard pages properly fetch data using authAPI.getMaster() for master ID
Services CRUD operations work correctly with Slotta calculation
Calendar block time modal submits to /api/calendar/blocks correctly
Settings page Save Changes updates master profile via /api/masters/{id}
seed_data_creation: Created test user via registration flow during UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Auth system fully implemented and tested. All master dashboard pages (Dashboard, Bookings, Calendar, Services, Clients, Wallet, Analytics, Settings) are connected to backend APIs. Test user created: uitest_4169d49d@slotta.app / test123456. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_auth_and_api.py cover all auth endpoints and CRUD operations.

features_tested.auth_registration: PASS - POST /api/auth/register creates user and returns JWT token
features_tested.auth_login: PASS - POST /api/auth/login validates credentials and returns JWT
features_tested.auth_me: PASS - GET /api/auth/me returns current user with valid token
features_tested.services_crud: PASS - Add, edit, delete services work correctly
features_tested.bookings: PASS - Fetches and displays bookings from /api/bookings/master/{id}
features_tested.calendar: PASS - Block Time modal submits to /api/calendar/blocks
features_tested.settings: PASS - Save Changes updates master profile via /api/masters/{id}
